raw_comment:
I notice that the 15- to 24-year-olds have a more positive outlook, saying that the world is getting better with each generation, than the 40+ year-olds.
I wonder what makes Indonesia above the 75% for both age groups. What are they doing in their country to make people think this way?
A catchy title for this graph could be "Sign of the Times"
ace_sentences: I notice a difference between the outlook of 15- to 24-year-olds and the outlook of people who are 40 years old or older.
The 15- to 24-year-olds have a more positive outlook than the people who are 40 years old or older.
The 15- to 24-year-olds say that the world is getting better with each generation.
I wonder why Indonesia is above 75% for both age groups.
I ask what Indonesia does in Indonesia.
I ask what makes people in Indonesia think in this way.
The title is "Sign of the Times".
